title: Stock Update: Lockheed Martin Corporation (NYSE:LMT) – Field Tests Prove INFIRNO™ Sensor System Performance
content:
at 09:27 AM EDT [PR Newswire] – ORLANDO, Fla., Sept. 15, 2015 /PRNewswire/ — Lockheed Martin (NYSE: LMT) recently completed a successful INFIRNO test, demonstrating the system’s performance and reliability.
